description: Detects usage of bitsadmin downloading a file using an URL that contains an IP
name: Bitsadmin Download File from IP
query: (process.executable:*\\bitsadmin.exe AND process.command_line:(*\ \/transfer\ * OR *\ \/create\ * OR *\ \/addfile\ *) AND process.command_line:(*http\:\/\/1* OR *http\:\/\/2* OR *http\:\/\/3* OR *http\:\/\/4* OR *http\:\/\/5* OR *http\:\/\/6* OR *http\:\/\/7* OR *http\:\/\/8* OR *http\:\/\/9* OR *https\:\/\/1* OR *https\:\/\/2* OR *https\:\/\/3* OR *https\:\/\/4* OR *https\:\/\/5* OR *https\:\/\/6* OR *https\:\/\/7* OR *https\:\/\/8* OR *https\:\/\/9*))
author: Florian Roth
